How do I know Leandra English should be in charge of CFPB this morning? 
The Dodd-Frank law creating @CFPB says the Deputy Director is in charge in the absence of a Director
There is currently an absence of a Director
Leandra English is Deputy Director
Therefore, she's in charge

Just because you don’t like Dodd-Frank doesn’t mean you can ignore it. The Dodd-Frank Act is clear—in the absence of a director, the deputy director of @CFPB is in charge. That means Leandra English.

Without the threat of a massive lawsuit, financial institutions are free to continue to defraud their customers with no accountability
But today, GOP is trying to repeal that rule, thinking Americans should be denied their right to sue when Big Banks don’t play by the rules
The @CFPB, supported by many of us in Congress, rightfully banned the #RipOffClause for the financial sector to protect consumer's rights

Even after the Wells Fargo scandal became public, they used a #RipOffClause to deprive customers of their day in court
So without the threat of a major lawsuit, Wells Fargo opened millions of fake accounts for their customers which racked up millions in fees
Currently, financial institutions can use arbitration clauses (#RipOffClause) to ban you from joining a class-action lawsuit against them

I am outraged that a company almost wholly unaccountable to the public could wreak so much havoc on innocent people.
Then we learn that some top Equifax Execs sold the company’s shares just days after the incident, making $1.8M in profits!
This means that if every American affected paid the fee, Equifax could make more than $1B (not a typo, that’s a B)
And if those affected want to freeze their credit in order to protect themselves, they have to pay Equifax a $5-$10 fee
Equifax then tried to sneakily take away the victim’s right to sue, only to reverse that decision after severe public outrage
Equifax apparently wasted those 6 weeks, failing to figure out how to best help the citizens they put in danger of identity/credit theft.
What’s jaw-dropping is that it took Equifax 6 weeks to inform the public that the breach even happened & that they were at extreme risk
First, Equifax is one of the nation's 3 credit reporting agencies so the security breach there is a huge deal that requires immediate action

Thanks for all the interest in my #immigration reform town hall. So many great Qs I couldn't get to. Will answer a few more now #AskMenendez
#Immigration Reform: Thank you to @Votolatino & @ergeekgoddess & everyone involved. #AskMenendez
#Immigration Reform: Thank you everyone! We're not going to stop here & answer questions as we can. #AskMenendez
A: I’m an optimist. 2012 election was historic. We have momentum. Let’s seize the moment. Let your voice be heard for reform #AskMenendez
A:Soy optimista. La elección del 2012 fue histórica. No desperdiciemos este momento.Deja q tu voz sea escuchada a favor de #CIR #AskMenendez
Q:We've seen Rs block the #DREAMAct & negotiations in 2007. Why do you believe #CIR will pass this time around?–Andrea Silva #AskMenendez
Q:Hemos visto como los Rs bloquearon el #DREAMAct y negociaciones del 2007.Por qué crees que pasará #CIR esta vez?–Andrea Silva #AskMenendez
#Immigration Reform: This is abt growing our economy & avoiding an underclass #AskMenendez
A: Educate your communities & House reps. e.g. Write op-eds & letters to editors, screen #immigration videos & use online media #AskMenendez
Q:What can the avg person do to aide in passing comprehensive #immigration reform? Specific examples please – Christian Schmidt #AskMenendez
A:Yes, immigrants in registered provisional immigrant status would be permitted to travel abroad for up to 180 days #AskMenendez
Q:While waiting in the US for a status adjustment, can an immigrant travel abroad & return to the US? – Deana Moreno #AskMenendez
A:Yes, our bill strengthens border security & helps prevent crime. $3-6bil for better tech on the border, fencing & security #AskMenendez
Q:There seems to be a lot of crime from our southern borders. Will #immigration reform make this better? – Kyle Bracken #AskMenendez
A: There's a simpler process for #DREAMers who received Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals (DACA), not auto- legalization. #AskMenendez
Q:Will ppl w/already-approved work permits from the recent DACA prgm be automatically legalized?–Raquel from Oklahoma City #AskMenendez
A: Best #DreamAct ever in #Gangof8 bill. #DREAMers could apply for residency (then citizenship) after 5yrs w/provisional status #AskMenendez
Q:Will #DREAMers be affected by the reform or will they gain residency at a faster rate? – Maria Santana #AskMenendez #LATISM #ImReadyVL
A:If you've had TPS (or other temp status) for 10yrs+, you'd be immediately eligible for a green card & 3yrs later-citizenship. #AskMenendez
Q:I have Temporary Protected Status (TPS). Will I have to wait 13 years to become a US citizen ? – Aracely Chinchilla #AskMenendez
A:We give DHS case-by-case discretion 4 torn apart fams & help stop states from ending parental rights based on parents' status #AskMenendez
Q:What happens to separated families who've had kids put in the system bc no one could take them to their parents?–Kesley Umana #AskMenendez
A:Immediately reunifies green card holder w/spouse & minor kids. Helps deported families reunite & speeds process 4 ppl waiting #AskMenendez
Q:What does the bill hope to accomplish in regards to keeping families together? – Lorena  #ImReadyVL #immigration
A: @amprog estimates our bill could add $832bil to GDP over 10yrs. Plus, more legal future #immigration adds another $1.8 tril+.#AskMenendez

Heading 2 floor b4 vote on my bill 2 #EndOilSubsidies. Middle class fams are struggling,  #BigOil co's aren't. Tune in: http://cs.pn/i1Erdp
A: #NJ is number 2 in solar. That's a lot of jobs. We hurt solar, we hurt #NJ. #AskMenendez
Q: RT @JennyMCoffey Why do u think it's ok 2 spend our hard earned tax $ on ur pet 'energy' projects? We are trillions in debt #AskMenendez
A: I have. My Use It Or Lose bill would get #BigOil to stop sitting on 50 million idle acres & start producing more. #AskMenendez
Q: RT @TomSzymanski  u discuss gas prices but dont support domestic supplies(Key Pipe) which could lower consumer prices. Why? #AskMenendez
A: I don't think we can sit by & let the mkt gouge ppl @ the pump. Need 2 do what we can & that means alt fuels & efficiency #AskMenendez
Q: RT @JennyMCoffey If it is an effective, affordable idea the private, free market will invest. Do you agree?  #AskMenendez
A: Ha. You are right that electricity is derived from many energy sources. #AskMenendez
Q: RT @HoustonNewNews @SenatorMenendez did you just call electricity an energy SOURCE? wait...What? #AskMenendez
A: My bill ends subsidies to Big Oil and uses it to extend existing tax incentives for alternatives. #AskMenendez
Q: RT @nnjteaparty caught in a lie. Says "My bill will end subsidies" then says will "invest in alts" -- meaning, subsidies. #AskMenendez
A: Not sure why we would let China clean our clocks in renewable energy only to subsidize #BigOil, but thx for the question! #AskMenendez
Q: RT @owendbanks You will end corporation tax breaks for oil companies and loot taxpayers to fund your green scam energy? #AskMenendez
A: Absolutely.  Was proud to help get NJ $450 million in high speed rail funds but there is much more to do. #AskMenendez
Q: RT @E_Urquijo why don't U join up with the other NE Corridor Sens and Govs to get us high speed rail ? Most proftble rte. #AskMenendez
A: You are right we can't! #AskMenendez
Q: RT @LovNRDC We're running deficits and debt, how can we afford subsidizing a wildly profitable industry? #AskMenendez
A: Right now u pay #BigOil 2x: @ pump & as taxpayer. My bill will end subsidies, invest in alts 2 help drive down gas prices #AskMenendez
Q: RT @syarn How does Repealing Tax Subsidies Act protect individual consumers from even higher gas prices passed on by #BigOil?#AskMenendez
A: Yes that's what my leg aims to do: end subsidies 4 #BigOil who made $137bil profits in '11 & extend clean energy tax credits #AskMenendez
Q: RT @livelited Will you help put an end to subsidizing oil companies? And help put that money towards greentech? #AskMenendez
A con't: Becoming more energy secure will drive down fuel costs. Need 2 invest in alt clean energy & raising fuel econ standard #AskMenendez
A: I agree. We need to do everything we can to become less dependent on 1 fuel source & allow others to compete w/ oil.  #AskMenendez
Q: RT @grandpabear Why are we still oil dependent in the first place?? When are we going to stop the insanity? #AskMenendez
A con't: We can better regulate these mkts by curbing excess speculation on Wall St & release oil from Strategic Petro Reserve #AskMenendez
A: b/c oil & oil products are traded on global, electronic markets that can take wild swings & in turn cause pain @ the pump #AskMenendez
Q: If gas has been delivered, produced, etc how is it the price of gas goes up while it waits 2 be sold underground? #AskMenendez – Marleny
A: Exactly. Oil prod. is @ 8yr high yet prices are skyrocketing along w/ #BigOil profits. We need to dvlp more affordable alts #AskMenendez
Q: RT @MrcGnzls GOP claims drilling is the answer, but isn’t US oil production increasing? Why haven’t gas prices gone down? #AskMenendez
A con't: If we shield #NJ transit from high fuel prices, they won't be have to cut service or raise fares this summer  #AskMenendez
A: Thanks. I wrote the #NatGas Act in part to encourage #NJ public transit to run on #NatGas. #AskMenendez
Q: RT @JustinNYSE Thank you for supporting the Nat Gas Act, why don't we start converting all NJ's government vehicles to CNG? #AskMenendez
A: Yes, petroleum products for 1st time since '49. I have leg that says if we drill it here, we should keep it here. #AskMenendez
Q: RT @gwitzel I read an Article that the USA is exporting more oil than importing. Is this true? & if so why? especially now!  #AskMenendez
A con't: We can move aggressively to spur market to invest in cars that run on electricity, #NatGas & alternative fuels #AskMenendez
A: Unfort.car manufacturers say 54.5mpg by 2025 (President's plan) is fastest they can move. Great start, but more can be done #AskMenendez
Q: RT @ssbrillhart Why don't we require car manufacturers to do more to improve fuel economy? #AskMenendez
A: Not really. But we can cut $24bil in tax subsidies #Big5Oil will receive in next 10 yrs. Tell your reps to support my bill! #AskMenendez
Q: RT @TheAnnHirsch Isn't there a way to limit the profits the oil companies are allowed to make?  #AskMenendez
A: Releasing oil reserves to put downward pressure on oil prices is great idea that's been effective in past. Time to do so NOW #AskMenendez
Q: RT @Leopard8 Since the USA has oil reserves, why don't we use these temporarily until we develop extraction of what we own? #AskMenendez
A con't: I created an energy efficiency program to fund #NJ communities to save energy. Cheapest energy is unused energy.  #AskMenendez
A: We can support @WhiteHouse plan to get 54.5 mpg by 2025 & support/extend tax incentives 2 make homes more energy efficient   #AskMenendez
Q: How can we implement more energy efficiency and conservation now to reduce our dependence on fossil fuels? #AskMenendez -email from Amy
A: Electricity & NatGas. Both are widely avail & cheaper than oil based fuels. Great alternatives that are complimentary techs #AskMenendez
Q: What do you think NJ's best shot at an alternative energy source is and how soon can we realistically see results? #AskMenendez – Elana
A con't: GOP bill would issue permits 4 #Keystone w/out final route selected. Can't know enviro impacts w/out knowing route! #AskMenendez
A: I support #KeystonePipeline as long as it receives enviro permits, bans exporting that oil & uses domestic materials 2 build #AskMenendez
Q: RT @T2012JS Why did you vote against the Keystone pipeline when gas prices are going through the roof? #AskMenendez
A: Ban the export of oil/refined products coming from public lands. That's what my bill called Drill It Here Keep It Here does. #AskMenendez
Q: Can anything be done to stop the rise in diesel gas prices so transpo costs will stop being passed to consumers? #AskMenendez – Armondo
A: 50mil acres under lease by oil co's r not being drilled. I'm telling oil co's to Use It or Lose It. Can't squat on resources #AskMenendez
Q: RT @brandt_mike When will we finally start drilling for our own energy on our own Federal Lands? #AskMenendez
A: We've passed leg 4 CFTC 2 limit oil specs from taking bets & drive up prices. They r moving too slow.Looking @ other action #AskMenendez
